mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_MEMBER (MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_PASSWORD, MEMBER_NICKNAME, MEMBER_KAKAO_PROFILE_URL, MEMBER_PROFILE_ID, MEMBER_INTRODUCTION) VALUES (#{memberEmail}, #{memberPassword, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memberNickname}, #{memberKakaoProfileUrl, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memberProfileId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memberIntroduction, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: SELECT m.ID, m.MEMBER_EMAIL, m.MEMBER_PASSWORD, m.MEMBER_NICKNAME, m.MEMBER_KAKAO_ID, m.MEMBER_KAKAO_PROFILE_URL, m.MEMBER_PROFILE_ID, m.MEMBER_INTRODUCTION, m.MEMBER_PAYMENT_TOTAL, m.MEMBER_CREATE_TIME, m.MEMBER_UPDATE_TIME, m.MEMBER_STATUS, (CASE WHEN m.HAS_PAYMENT_METHOD = 'Y' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS PAYMENT_METHOD_EXISTS, (CASE WHEN a.MEMBER_ID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS IS_ARTIST FROM TBL_MEMBER m LEFT JOIN TBL_ARTIST a ON m.ID = a.MEMBER_ID WHERE m.id = #{memberId}

SELECT m.ID, m.MEMBER_EMAIL, m.MEMBER_PASSWORD, m.MEMBER_NICKNAME, m.MEMBER_KAKAO_ID, m.MEMBER_KAKAO_PROFILE_URL, m.MEMBER_PROFILE_ID, m.MEMBER_INTRODUCTION, m.MEMBER_PAYMENT_TOTAL, m.MEMBER_CREATE_TIME, m.MEMBER_UPDATE_TIME, m.MEMBER_STATUS, (CASE WHEN m.HAS_PAYMENT_METHOD = 'Y' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS PAYMENT_METHOD_EXISTS, (CASE WHEN a.MEMBER_ID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS IS_ARTIST FROM TBL_MEMBER m LEFT JOIN TBL_ARTIST a ON m.ID = a.MEMBER_ID WHERE m.MEMBER_EMAIL = #{memberEmail}

SELECT ID, MEMBER_EMAIL as email, MEMBER_NICKNAME as nickname, CASE WHEN MEMBER_PROFILE_ID IS NOT NULL THEN '/api/v1/files/' || MEMBER_PROFILE_ID WHEN MEMBER_KAKAO_PROFILE_URL IS NOT NULL THEN MEMBER_KAKAO_PROFILE_URL ELSE '/images/default-profile.png' END AS profilePath, MEMBER_INTRODUCTION as description FROM TBL_MEMBER WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.update:
UPDATE TBL_MEMBER
MEMBER_NICKNAME = #{memberNickname, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MEMBER_INTRODUCTION = #{memberIntroduction, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MEMBER_PROFILE_ID = #{memberProfileId, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MEMBER_UPDATE_TIME = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
WHERE ID = #{id, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
UPDATE TBL_MEMBER SET MEMBER_PASSWORD = #{newPassword}, MEMBER_UPDATE_TIME = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE ID = #{memberId}
UPDATE TBL_MEMBER SET MEMBER_STATUS = #{status}, MEMBER_UPDATE_TIME = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE ID = #{id}
UPDATE TBL_MEMBER SET MEMBER_EMAIL = #{memberEmail}, MEMBER_KAKAO_PROFILE_URL = #{memberKakaoProfileUrl}, MEMBER_UPDATE_TIME = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE ID = #{id}
UPDATE TBL_MEMBER SET MEMBER_STATUS = 'ACTIVE', MEMBER_UPDATE_TIME = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE ID = #{id}
UPDATE TBL_MEMBER SET MEMBER_STATUS = 'DISABLE', MEMBER_UPDATE_TIME = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE ID = #{id}
UPDATE TBL_MEMBER SET MEMBER_PAYMENT_TOTAL = MEMBER_PAYMENT_TOTAL + #{amount}, MEMBER_UPDATE_TIME = SYSTIMESTAMP WHERE ID = #{memberId}
